atmosphere.de: Authentische landwirtschaftliche Feier mit traditionellen Methoden und Gemeinschaftsbeteiligung
atmosphere.en: Authentic agricultural celebration with traditional methods and community participation
atmosphere.fr: Authentique célébration agricole avec méthodes traditionnelles et participation communautaire
atmosphere.it: Autentica celebrazione agricola con metodi tradizionali e partecipazione comunitaria

highlights.en: Traditional olive pressing, premium oil tastings, grove walks, cooking demonstrations
highlights.fr: Pressage traditionnel olives, dégustations huile premium, promenades oliveraies, démonstrations cuisine
highlights.it: Spremitura tradizionale olive, degustazioni olio premium, passeggiate uliveti, dimostrazioni cucina

description.de: Dreitägige Feier der Olivenernte mit traditionellen Olivenpressvorführungen, nativem Olivenöl extra Verkostungen, Hain-Touren, lokaler Küche mit Olivenöl und Bildungssessions über ligurische Olivenanbautraditionen.
description.en: Three-day celebration of the olive harvest featuring traditional olive pressing demonstrations, extra virgin olive oil tastings, grove tours, local cuisine showcasing olive oil, and educational sessions about Ligurian olive growing traditions.
description.fr: Célébration de trois jours de récolte olives avec démonstrations traditionnelles pressage olives, dégustations huile olive extra vierge, tours oliveraies, cuisine locale mettant en valeur huile olive et sessions éducatives sur traditions oléicoles liguriennes.
description.it: Celebrazione di tre giorni del raccolto delle olive con dimostrazioni tradizionali di spremitura olive, degustazioni olio extravergine d'oliva, tour degli uliveti, cucina locale che valorizza l'olio d'oliva e sessioni educative sulle tradizioni olivicole liguri.

activity.en: Olive grove tours and harvest explanation
Guided olive oil tastings with local breads
activity.fr: Dégustations guidées huile olive avec pains locaux
activity.it: Degustazioni guidate olio d'oliva con pani locali

location.address: Via del Santuario and surrounding olive groves, 19017 Riomaggiore SP

seo_title.de: Olivenöl Erntefest Riomaggiore 2025 - Ligurisches Natives Olivenöl Extra Verkostung Cinque Terre
seo_title.en: Olive Oil Harvest Festival Riomaggiore 2025 - Ligurian Extra Virgin Oil Tasting Cinque Terre
seo_title.fr: Festival Récolte Huile Olive Riomaggiore 2025 - Dégustation Huile Extra Vierge Ligure Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Festa Raccolta Olio Oliva Riomaggiore 2025 - Degustazione Olio Extravergine Ligure Cinque Terre

specialties.de: Frisch gepresstes natives Olivenöl extra, Bruschetta, Focaccia, lokale Oliven, traditionelle Brote
specialties.en: Fresh pressed extra virgin olive oil, bruschetta, focaccia, local olives, traditional breads
specialties.fr: Huile olive extra vierge fraîchement pressée, bruschetta, focaccia, olives locales, pains traditionnels
specialties.it: Olio extravergine appena spremuto, bruschetta, focaccia, olive locali, pani tradizionali

dress_code.de: Bequeme Outdoor-Kleidung und geschlossene Schuhe für Hain-Besuche
dress_code.en: Comfortable outdoor clothing and closed shoes for grove visits
dress_code.fr: Vêtements extérieur confortables et chaussures fermées pour visites oliveraies
dress_code.it: Abbigliamento outdoor comodo e scarpe chiuse per visite uliveti

accessibility.de: Dorfzentrum-Veranstaltungen zugänglich, Olivenhaine erfordern Gehen auf unebenem Gelände
accessibility.en: Village center events accessible, olive groves require walking on uneven terrain
accessibility.fr: Événements centre village accessibles, oliveraies nécessitent marche terrain irrégulier
accessibility.it: Eventi centro borgo accessibili, uliveti richiedono camminata su terreno irregolare

seo_description.de: Entdecken Sie das feinste ligurische Olivenöl beim Olivenöl Erntefest in Riomaggiore. Erleben Sie traditionelle Pressmethoden, expertgeleitete Verkostungen, Hain-Touren und authentische Olivenöl-Küche in der malerischen Cinque Terre Landschaft.
seo_description.en: Discover the finest Ligurian olive oil at Riomaggiore's Olive Oil Harvest Festival. Experience traditional pressing methods, expert-guided tastings, grove tours, and authentic olive oil cuisine in the scenic Cinque Terre countryside.
seo_description.fr: Découvrez la plus fine huile d'olive ligure au Festival Récolte Huile d'Olive de Riomaggiore. Découvrez méthodes pressage traditionnelles, dégustations guidées par experts, tours oliveraies et cuisine authentique huile olive dans pittoresque campagne Cinque Terre.
seo_description.it: Scopri il miglior olio d'oliva ligure alla Festa Raccolta Olio d'Oliva di Riomaggiore. Vivi metodi di spremitura tradizionali, degustazioni guidate da esperti, tour degli uliveti e autentica cucina all'olio d'oliva nella pittoresca campagna delle Cinque Terre.

rain_plan.de: Innenräume für Verkostungen verfügbar, Hain-Touren wetterabhängig
rain_plan.en: Indoor venues available for tastings, grove tours weather dependent
rain_plan.fr: Lieux intérieurs disponibles pour dégustations, tours oliveraies dépendants météo
rain_plan.it: Location interne disponibili per degustazioni, tour uliveti dipendenti dal tempo

insider_tips.de: Frisches Olivenöl direkt von Produzenten kaufen, traditionelle Verkostungstechniken lernen
insider_tips.en: Purchase fresh olive oil directly from producers, learn traditional tasting techniques
insider_tips.fr: Acheter huile olive fraîche directement producteurs, apprendre techniques dégustation traditionnelles
insider_tips.it: Acquista olio d'oliva fresco direttamente dai produttori, impara tecniche degustazione tradizionali

best_time_to_visit.de: Samstagmorgen für Press-Demonstrationen, Abend für Verkostungen
best_time_to_visit.en: Saturday morning for pressing demonstrations, evening for tastings
best_time_to_visit.fr: Samedi matin pour démonstrations pressage, soir pour dégustations
best_time_to_visit.it: Sabato mattina per dimostrazioni spremitura, sera per degustazioni
